description: CloudFormation template to ensure multi-environment consistency and replication between Development and Production environments
constraints: Use AWS CloudFormation YAML format to define the infrastructure
Create two distinct environments: Development and Production
Both environments should have VPCs with identical CIDR blocks for consistency
Provision one EC2 instance in each environment with identical instance types t2.micro
Ensure each environment has an S3 bucket with versioning enabled
Use environment-specific parameter overrides for resource names to avoid conflicts
Implement IAM roles in both environments with least privilege access to S3 buckets
Ensure S3 buckets are set to deny public access globally in both environments
Utilize CloudFormation Outputs to export VPC IDs for cross-stack referencing
Implement VPC Endpoints for S3 to restrict data traffic within the AWS network
author: iamarpit-turing
